name: Project Lantern
description:
It's a prototype of an old canceled project.

In this game you control a character and a living flame in the same time. You can move both of them to solve puzzles.

The goal is to light a special lamp to open a door which leads to the next level.

A gamepad is required to play this prototype.

  • LS to move the character.
  • RS to move the flamme.
  • Press RB to jump.
  • hold LB to use your umbrella.

You can press f2 to switch between fullscreen and windowed mode.
